Q_DESC:
Write a menu driven C program to insert elements in linked list from front end and last end.Allow User to make a choice by taking input:
Enter 1: Insertion in front.
Enter 2:Delete element from the linked list
Enter 3:To print the linked list
Terminate the program when user enters 0;
Print the entered linked list

Input:
The first line contains the choice of the user.

Output:
Print the entered Linked list.
